submission:
import math
from typing import List


class Solution:
    def maximumValueSum(self, board: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        m = len(board)
        n = len(board[0])
        left = []
        for i in range(m):
            line = board[i]
            tmp = -math.inf
            now = []
            for j in range(n):
                now.append(tmp)
                tmp = max(tmp, line[j])
            left.append(now)
        right = []
        for i in range(m):
            line = board[i]
            tmp = -math.inf
            now = []
            for j in range(n - 1, -1, -1):
                now.append(tmp)
                tmp = max(tmp, line[j])
            now.reverse()
            right.append(now)
        up = []
        pre = [-math.inf] * n
        for i in range(m):
            line = board[i]
            now = []
            tmp = []
            for j in range(n):
                now.append(pre[j])
                tmp.append(max(pre[j], line[j]))
            up.append(now)
            pre = tmp
        down = []
        pre = [-math.inf] * n
        for i in range(m - 1, -1, -1):
            line = board[i]
            now = []
            tmp = []
            for j in range(n):
                now.append(pre[j])
                tmp.append(max(pre[j], line[j]))
            down.append(now)
            pre = tmp
        down.reverse()
        up_left = []
        for i in range(m):
            now = []
            tmp = -math.inf
            line = up[i]
            for j in range(n):
                now.append(tmp)
                tmp = max(tmp, line[j])
            up_left.append(now)
        up_right = []
        for i in range(m):
            now = []
            tmp = -math.inf
            line = up[i]
            for j in range(n - 1, -1, -1):
                now.append(tmp)
                tmp = max(tmp, line[j])
            now.reverse()
            up_right.append(now)
        down_left = []
        for i in range(m - 1, -1, -1):
            now = []
            tmp = -math.inf
            line = down[i]
            for j in range(n):
                now.append(tmp)
                tmp = max(tmp, line[j])
            down_left.append(now)
        down_left.reverse()
        down_right = []
        for i in range(m - 1, -1, -1):
            now = []
            tmp = -math.inf
            line = down[i]
            for j in range(n - 1, -1, -1):
                now.append(tmp)
                tmp = max(tmp, line[j])
            now.reverse()
            down_right.append(now)
        down_right.reverse()
        ans = -math.inf
        for i, line in enumerate(board):
            up_line = up[i]
            right_line = right[i]
            down_line = down[i]
            left_line = left[i]
            up_left_line = up_left[i]
            down_left_line = down_left[i]
            up_right_line = up_right[i]
            down_right_line = down_right[i]
            for j, num in enumerate(line):
                u = up_line[j]
                r = right_line[j]
                d = down_line[j]
                l = left_line[j]
                ur = up_right_line[j]
                ul = up_left_line[j]
                dr = down_right_line[j]
                dl = down_left_line[j]
                ans = max(ans, num + max(ul + dr, ur + dl), u + l + dr, u + r + dl, d + l + ur, d + r + ul)
                # print(u, r, d, l, ur, ul, dr, dl, ans)
        return ans
